alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 2:32AM PST until December 24 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with accumulations of 7 to 15 inches above 7500 feet. 3 to 7 inches 5800 to 7500 feet. 1 to 3 inches below 5800 feet. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range...and Southwest Elko County * WHEN...Late Thursday morning through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible through Secret Pass with possible hazardous conditions on Lamoille Summit Thursday night. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute due to snow or refreezing of moisture on road surfaces Thursday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County
